name: TextMate Language Grammar File
summary: Learn about .TMLANGUAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TMLANGUAGE files are saved using XML formatting but may be encoded with a binary representation of the XML data.

NOTE: TextMate language grammar files are often saved as binary Property List (.PLIST) files. For example, some of the .TMBUNDLE files included with the TextMate installation include a PLIST file in their /​Syntaxes/​ directory.

description: Language grammar file used by TextMate, a Mac OS X source code editor; contains a specification for the syntax of a programming language; used for adding syntax highlighting support for additional languages.
